name: ramp-fitness-planner
description: AI-powered fitness planning application with React frontend and Node/Express backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.gcp-deploy: npm run build && gcloud run deploy ramp-fitness-planner --source . --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated --set-env-vars NODE_ENV=production,PORT=8080
scripts.gcp-appengine-deploy: npm run build && gcloud app deploy --quiet
